verbose_text: With regard to the regulating role of microglia in the TNF-alpha secretion, recent studies have revealed that the activation of P2X receptor (purinergic receptor) in activated microglia induced by ATP leads to the reduction of TNF-alpha release while astrocytes can release ATP after brain injury.
evidence: P2X receptor (purinergic receptor) in activated microglia induced by ATP leads to the reduction of TNF-alpha release               while astrocytes can release ATP
